name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE!!!】3D新衣装お披露目!! ゲストと歌って踊って生誕祭♪♪♪【hololive⧸宝鐘マリン】 [wF_VmniNI2I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Houshou Marine and Sakamata Chloe perform the song 'Serial Killer'.
MC section between Houshou Marine and Sakamata Chloe discussing the previous song performance.
Houshou Marine and Hoshimachi Suisei perform the song '1000%SPARKING!'.

subtitles.original:
透き通る夜こそ 気をつけなければならないさ
夜な夜な現れる シリアルキラーに
subtitles.english:
In the clear night, you must be careful.
Night after night, the serial killer appears.

subtitles.original:
月の照らす静寂に 騒ぎ立てる者こそ
霧へと消えれば 夜忍ぶはなくて
subtitles.english:
In the moonlit silence, those who make a fuss
disappear into the mist, and the night hides nothing.

subtitles.original:
ああ、イケないよ 殺人鬼を悪戯に
駆り立てる言葉
subtitles.english:
Ah, it's no good. Words that mischievously
drive the killer.

subtitles.original:
ねえ、怯え惑う者にこそ
殺人鬼は現れるそうよ
subtitles.english:
Hey, it seems the killer appears specifically
to those who are trembling in confusion.

subtitles.original:
出会いは唐突ながら
月明かりの下 惹かれゆく
subtitles.english:
The encounter is sudden,
but under the moonlight, we are drawn together.

subtitles.original:
月夜に飢える 昏い瞳をした
狼の気配は 深まる夜のしじまに
subtitles.english:
Starving for the moonlit night, with dark eyes,
the presence of the wolf deepens in the silence of the night.

subtitles.original:
霧満ちる 都市の灯の中で
男と女は踊る
subtitles.english:
In the mist-filled city lights,
man and woman dance,

subtitles.original:
互いに狙いを定めて
今宵も獲物はそこに
subtitles.english:
aiming at each other.
Tonight too, the prey is there.

subtitles.original:
ああ、人影も途絶えた
暗い独り言に 絶望
subtitles.english:
Ah, where no one else is near.
Despair in a dark monologue.

subtitles.original: 月を背に 殺人鬼は牙を剥いた
subtitles.english: With the moon at their back, the killer bared their fangs.

subtitles.original:
出会いも唐突ならば
別れも切な 刹那の出来事
subtitles.english:
If the encounter is sudden,
then the parting is also a sad, momentary event.

subtitles.original:
月夜に嗤う 紅い瞳をした
狼の姿は
subtitles.english:
Sneering in the moonlit night, with red eyes,
the wolf's figure is

subtitles.original:
月を映すナイフを手に
佇むシリアルキラー
subtitles.english:
standing still with a knife reflecting the moon,
a serial killer.

subtitles.original:
決して満たされることは無く
やがては再び彷徨う
subtitles.english:
Never being satisfied,
eventually wandering again.

subtitles.original: 今宵も獲物は何処に
subtitles.english: Tonight too, where is the prey?

subtitles.original: よっしゃー！沙花叉に勝った！
subtitles.english: Yesss! I beat Sakamata!

subtitles.original: ねえ！勝ってないでしょ！
subtitles.english: Hey! You didn't win!

subtitles.original: いや、船長はね、沙花叉を殺すのが夢だったんだ。
subtitles.english: Well, it was the Captain's dream to kill Sakamata.

subtitles.original: ねえ、ひどい！掃除屋なのに！
subtitles.english: Hey, that's mean! Even though I'm a cleaner!

subtitles.original: 掃除しちゃいました。
subtitles.english: I cleaned you up.

subtitles.original: 掃除されたんですけど。
subtitles.english: I got cleaned, though.

subtitles.original: いやー、この曲ね、実は東方のボーカルアレンジの曲なんだけど。
subtitles.english: Wow, this song is actually a Touhou vocal arrangement.

subtitles.original: もう、マジで歌詞が沙花叉にぴったりなの。
subtitles.english: The lyrics really fit Sakamata perfectly.

subtitles.original: いやー、ほんと、銀髪とかね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, truly, with the silver hair and all.

subtitles.original: そうそう、シリアルキラーとかね。
subtitles.english: Exactly, and 'serial killer'.

subtitles.original: そうそうそう、だから沙花叉が勝つと思ったのに！
subtitles.english: Right, right, so I thought Sakamata would win!

subtitles.original: ちょっと勝ってみた。
subtitles.english: I tried winning for a bit.

subtitles.original: ねえ、やだー！でも、めっちゃ良かったです！
subtitles.english: Hey, no way! But it was really great!

subtitles.original: めっちゃ良かった。
subtitles.english: It was really good.

subtitles.original: いやー、次こそ絶対マリン先輩に勝ちますからね！
subtitles.english: Man, next time I'll definitely beat you, Marine-senpai!

subtitles.original: 船長の勝ち！勝ち勝ち勝ち勝ち！
subtitles.english: Captain's victory! Win win win win!

subtitles.original: 船長の勝ちじゃない！
subtitles.english: It's not Captain's victory!

subtitles.original: 沙花叉の勝ちー！
subtitles.english: Sakamata wins!

subtitles.original: 胸のピストル鳴らして 焼けに鼓動が邪魔する
subtitles.english: Firing the pistol in my chest, my heartbeat is terribly bothersome.

subtitles.original: 落ち着いてられないそんな情熱
subtitles.english: Such passion that I can't stay calm.

subtitles.original: 解きかけの熱い方程式 次の扉を開いて
subtitles.english: A half-solved hot equation, opening the next door.

subtitles.original: いけない憧れ時があるよね
subtitles.english: There are times when there's a forbidden longing, right?

subtitles.original: 譲れないその想いに 君が輝くから
subtitles.english: Because you shine in that feeling that can't be surrendered.

subtitles.original: くじけそうな 今日も平気 成功への 助走は前へ
subtitles.english:
Even on days when I'm about to give up, I'm okay.
The run-up to success is forward.
